title: Charlie Munger, legendary investor and crypto skeptic, dies at 99
description:
Charles Thomas Munger, an investing legend known for his partnership with Warren Buffett as Berkshire Hathaway’s vice chairman, died Nov. 28 at the age of 99. Munger’s family informed Berkshire that he passed away in a California hospital earlier this morning. Munger had a long and storied career across multiple industries, most notably as one […]

The post Charlie Munger, legendary investor and crypto skeptic, dies at 99 appeared first on CryptoSlate.
